title: Injuries to LeBron and LaMelo
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Dave McMenamin about LeBron's injury, how far the Lakers might fall, and the passing of Elgin Baylor. Then ESPN's Kevin Pelton (38:26) breaks down LaMelo Ball's injury, and the Rookie of the Year race.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
